Package com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.messages

Class Summary
BinaryMessage BinaryMessage.java

Represents the details of a binary message that is to be submitted via the Nexmo REST api

Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34
Message Message.java

Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34

Represents the details of a message that is to be submitted via the http api.
Not instanciated directly, but instead via one of the sub-classes that represent a particular message type
TextMessage TextMessage.java

Represents the details of a plain-text message that is to be submitted via the Nexmo REST api

Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34
UnicodeMessage UnicodeMessage.java

Represents the details of a unicode text message that is to be submitted via the Nexmo REST api Unicode messages are required when sending messages to the handset that contain characters that are not within the GSM alphabet.
For example, sending messages in Arabic or Chinese

Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34
USSDDisplayMessage USSDDisplayMessage.java

Represents the details of a plain-text ussd 'display' message that is to be submitted via the Nexmo REST api
This message will 'pop up' on the handset, and does not require the user to respond Created on 5 January 2013, 17:34
USSDPromptMessage USSDPromptMessage.java

Represents the details of a plain-text ussd 'prompt' message that is to be submitted via the Nexmo REST api
This message will 'pop up' on the handset, and request that the end user responds.
WapPushMessage WapPushMessage.java

Represents the details of a wap-push message that is to be submitted via the Nexmo REST api

Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34
